column3: @super3 The Bitcoin Foundation does not officially or unofficially offer the torrent.  That's all me, in my spare time.\n
@jgarzik Where does the Bitcoin Foundation come into this PR at all? I don't see @super3 suggesting they endorse anything...\n
Ok, that has been fixed. Let me know if there is anything else. \n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/1b61d988987f9197ff2fb321c1dbf0a246ea349e for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
It would be best to include this guide in the Bitcoin tree instead of referring to an external site. Not that this is worse than referring people to the bitcointalk forums.\n
